com.ece.superkids

Interface FileManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileManagerImpl

    public interface FileManager
    The FileManager allows access to custom files stored on the local filesystem. Removes the dependency on file paths.
    Author:
    Ben Duong
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File getCustomQuestionsFile()
      Get the path to the file holding the custom questions.
      File getDirectory()
      Get the root directory all of the custom data is stored in.
      File getImagePathsFile()
      Get the path to the file holding the custom image path key-value pairs.
      File getImagesDirectory()
      Get the directory where the custom images are stored.
      File getUserFile(String userFile)
